attributes.action: During pandemic Student should get placement after resitting/referral assessment
attributes.additional_details: Let the university know that students need support and not to be exempted from placement just on failing a single module in the first attempt, they should be given one more chance to prove their ability. solely semester A marks should not be considered for a placement. They should be assessed overall. despite clearing reassessment/resitting cant take placement as per university, this has to be changed International students must be given relief in the 1st semester until they get Adapted.
attributes.background: As per pandemic there is less support from university towards assessments for international postgraduate students, Despite hardworking students fail one module because of less support and lose Placement.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual institutions.
